wikipedia_page.main: Bishop Simms (1767 – 30 January 1829) was an English organist and composer.

response: * Bishop Simms (1767–1829), British organist and composer

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals
St John the Baptist Church, Bromsgrove
response: There are records of organ in the church dating from 1808 when a small instrument was installed by Thomas Elliot. The opening recital was given by Bishop Simms. There have been subsequent rebuildings and renovations over the years, resulting in a 3-manual and pedal pipe organ. A specification of the organ can be found on the National Pipe Organ Register.http://www.npor.org.uk/cgi-bin/Rsearch.cgi?Fn=Rsearch&rec_index=£01185
